TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GeneralTransform extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Provides generalized transformation support for objects, such as points and rectangles. This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A transform defines how to map points from one coordinate space into another coordinate space. They can be used to produce effects such as rotation, scaling, and skewing.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform Clone ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform CloneCurrentValue ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Windows.Rect TransformBounds (System.Windows.Rect rect);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Rect TransformBounds(valuetype System.Windows.Rect rect) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified bounding box and returns an axis-aligned bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
Docs.returns: The smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains the transformed .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool TryTransform (System.Windows.Point inPoint, out System.Windows.Point result);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryTransform(valuetype System.Windows.Point inPoint, valuetype System.Windows.Point result) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
